passages.text: [[What's going on here?]]
passages.name: Angela Approaches The Guards

passages.text:
Sorry maam, park's condemned. Never actually opened in the first place.
[[Can I go in?]]
passages.name: What's going on here?

passages.text:
Sorry, authorized personal only.
[[Continue->Options_1]]
passages.name: Can I go in?

passages.text:
Pfft yeah right, you're not even in uniform! Come back with ID or something and we can talk.
[[Look around for clues]]
passages.name: Lie - I am authorized, the precinct sent me to relieve you of your shift.

passages.text:
And I need a drink, so I guess we're both dissapointed tonight sweetheart.
[[Look around for clues]]
passages.name: I need to take a look around, can I please go in?

passages.text:
(if:Police Uniform)[[[Play Pretend->Play Pretend]]]
(if:Fake ID)[[[Flash Fake ID->Fake Id 1]]]
[[Talk to the guards again]]
passages.name: Look around for clues

passages.text:
You again? I thought you'd fucked off already.
[[Continue->Question Guards]]
passages.name: Talk to the guards again

passages.text:
Sure, here ya go. *Angela recieves a pen*
[[Thanks, I'll be going now.]]
passages.name: I will, I just need to borrow a pen real quick

passages.text: [[Right, I'll be going now->Look around for clues]]
passages.name: Thanks, I'll be going now.

passages.text:
Angela flashes the fake ID which now claims her to be a municipal safety inspector. 
[[Continue->Fake Id 2]]
passages.name: Fake Id 1

passages.text: *Angela succsefully makes her way into the park*
passages.name: Enter the park

passages.text:
How do you do fellow officers? I am here for a shift change.
[[Continue->Play Pretend 2]]
passages.name: Play Pretend

passages.text:
[[Lie - I am authorized, the precinct sent me to relieve you of your shift.]]
[[I need to take a look around, can I please go in?]]

links.name: Lie - I am authorized, the precinct sent me to relieve you of your shift.
links.link: Lie - I am authorized, the precinct sent me to relieve you of your shift.

links.name: I need to take a look around, can I please go in?
links.link: I need to take a look around, can I please go in?

passages.name: Options_1

passages.text:
[[I'll leave soon, I just wanted to ask what's up with this place?->What's Going On 1]]
[[I will, I just need to borrow a pen real quick]]
[[ (Lie), I am, I just need my uhhh jacket, I think the wind blew it over the fence.->Lie_1]]
[[Sorry, I was just going - leave->Look around for clues]]

links.name: I'll leave soon, I just wanted to ask what's up with this place?
I will, I just need to borrow a pen real quick
links.link: I will, I just need to borrow a pen real quick

links.name: (Lie), I am, I just need my uhhh jacket, I think the wind blew it over the fence.
Sorry, I was just going - leave

passages.name: Question Guards

passages.text:
It's a crime scene is all you need to know, now please maam, move along. 
[[Continue->What's Going on 2]]
passages.name: What's Going On 1

passages.text:
Crime scene? Ha! Yeah some crime scene, a fuckin' clown got turned into jelly a year ago and now we gotta freeze our asses off so nobody can see the splat mark. 
[[Continue->What's Going on 3]]
passages.name: What's Going on 2

passages.text:
*Sigh* All you need to know, maam, is that it's a crime scene, and it's closed.
[[Right, I'll be going now->Look around for clues]]
passages.name: What's Going on 3

passages.text:
What? The wind blew your jacket over the fence? Did you really think that would work?
[[Continue->Lie_2]]
passages.name: Lie_1

passages.text:
Sorry, we can't let you in, you can check the lost and found bin if you want, maybe you can find a replacement. *He gestures towards a ratty plastic bin sitting near the park's entrance*
[[Look around for clues]]
passages.name: Lie_2

passages.text:
Municipal Safety Inspector? Woof and I thought I had a shit job.
[[Continue->Fake Id 3]]
passages.name: Fake Id 2

passages.text:
Go on through maam, and be careful, this place wasn't exactly well built. 
[[Enter the park]]
passages.name: Fake Id 3

passages.text:
'Bout fuckin' time! Ten more minutes and I would've frozen to that chair.
[[Continue->Play Pretend 3]]
passages.name: Play Pretend 2

passages.text:
*Checks his watch* Huh, earlier than usual, you sure this is right?
[[Positive, I'd enjoy the time off if I were you->Play Pretend 4]]

links.name: Positive, I'd enjoy the time off if I were you

passages.name: Play Pretend 3

passages.text:
Don't gotta tell me twice, good luck.
[[Continue->Play Pretend 5]]
passages.name: Play Pretend 4

passages.text:
Safe watch, maam.
[[Enter the park]]
passages.name: Play Pretend 5
